vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in PrivateBank.CashOut (0x23a91059fdc9579a9fbd0edc5f2ea0bfdb70deb4.sol#21-28):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_am)() (0x23a91059fdc9579a9fbd0edc5f2ea0bfdb70deb4.sol#23-26)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (0x23a91059fdc9579a9fbd0edc5f2ea0bfdb70deb4.sol#24)
